Class Dungeon

java.lang.Object
com.university.dungeon.Dungeon
public class Dungeon extends Object
The Dungeon class represents a multi-level dungeon in the game. It holds a 2D list of rooms, an entrance room, and the dungeon's current level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Dungeon(List<List<Room>> rooms, Room entranceRoom, int level)
    Constructs a Dungeon instance with the specified rooms, entrance room, and level.

  • Method Summary

    int
    getLevel()
    Returns the current level of the dungeon.
    List<List<Room>>
    getRooms()
    Returns the 2D list of rooms in the dungeon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dungeon

      public Dungeon(List<List<Room>> rooms, Room entranceRoom, int level)
      Constructs a Dungeon instance with the specified rooms, entrance room, and level.
      Parameters:
      rooms - A 2D list of rooms that make up the dungeon.
      entranceRoom - The room that serves as the entrance to the dungeon.
      level - The current level of the dungeon.

  • Method Details

    • getRooms

      Returns the 2D list of rooms in the dungeon.

      The 2D list of rooms.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
